overview: To celebrate 15 years of filmmaking Joybear is proud to present the Joy Collection - definitive moments from its award-winning catalogue. If you've ever had the fortune of being with two lovers simultaneously you'll know it can be one of the best sexual encounters ever. If you've never had a threesome before then what are you waiting for? In the meantime, for your viewing pleasure, we present Joybears latest line-up of the greatest trios!
title: Ménage à trois 2
